channel.title: Help with willscape
channel.description:
i downloaded it and its supposed to have skill capes and dragon full helms and god swords. BUT i keep getting the error line and it says... "Exception in thread "main" Java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server" then says press any key to continue...
can any one help please? i downloaded it off of this site!

item.title: Help with willscape
item.dc:creator: @dawgi100 dawgi100
item.description:
@dawgi100 wrote:

okay. ima try it. thanks alot. ill brb after installing [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2007, 01:24:10 PM[/size][hr]it didnt work… new error… Javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: Javac
Use -help for a list of options
Press any key to continue…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2007, 01:29:41 PM[/size][hr]please don’t leave me now.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with willscape
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

You need to download Jdk 6 Update 3, get it from here

After you download and install that and with my compiler code you will be up and ready to go.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with willscape
item.dc:creator: @dawgi100 dawgi100
item.description:
@dawgi100 wrote:

the compile says javac is not recognized as an internal or external command[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2007, 12:52:19 PM[/size][hr]can you add me to your aim or something? and then ill give you the file and you fix it for me?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with willscape
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Ok, then heres whatyou do, go in notepad and paste this in:

@echo off set path=c:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin javac -cp . *.java pause

If you don’t have Java 6 update 3 then go download it or change the code to your java type and then still on notepad click File > Save As > save to your desktop and name it compile.bat and drag it over to your wilscape file then click compile.bat then startserver.bat then your done.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with willscape
item.dc:creator: @dawgi100 dawgi100
item.description:
@dawgi100 wrote:

i already did that… Theres no compile button. theres only a startserver.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with willscape
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Did you have winrar? If not, download it here. Then install it then right click your wilscape file and say extract here then a new file will appear, go in that file then compile and run.

Read full topic
